subject: Three new Design projects: $4,650 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We've got three new Design projects, all related to the Online Review project. Each of these projects has an accelerated timeline and larger-than-average prize money. The projects are:

* Custom Java Resource Management Persistence Version 1.2 ($800.00)
* Java Resource Management Version 1.1 ($800.00)
* Custom Java Online Review Upload Services Version 1.0 ($1,500.00)

Learn more here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
